subject: Edward Smith Chambers
body:
Edward Smith Chambers
Legal Practitioners, solicitor and General advocate
Suit #5 Churchill Palace London. E14 5HP
United Kingdom.
Email: 
edwardsmithedward@yahoo.co.uk
Attn; Beneficiary
My name is Bar. Edward Smith, I am a Legal Advocate. I am the owner of
Edward Smith Chambers & Associates Law Firm. I officially consult for
NGO's and companies on legal/allied issues, Family Law; Intellectual
Property; Real Estate; Wills and Trusts. Currently I am the Head of
United Nations office on contract and inheritance payment,
humanitarian relief fund payment and monitoring Unit.
Your name appeared on the August 2022 payment gazette and We
understand that you have been duly notified and listed among those
that their payment is being moved through I.D.D.S to their given
addresses.
You are advised to stop any further payment to anyone in the name of
receiving your fund as such payment was not authorized by UN payment
and monitoring unit.
Your prompt respond is highly needed to finally verify if your payment
have been moved through UN I.D.D.S or wire transfer as we will not be
held responsible for diverted funds.
If you have not received this brief regarding your fund, kindly
respond with the bellow details.
1. Your full names as in your identity card or international passport.
2. Full house address.
3. Direct telephone contact
4. Valid identity card
We shall activate our payment mechanism as soon as you make the above
information available for immediate action.
Regards
Smith Edward LLB
Head. UN Payment and Monitoring Unit
London.
For urgent inquiry.. Whats-App +447700014977

subject: Re:    Edward Smith Chambers
body:
Dear Mr. Edward Smith,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am indeed surprised to hear that my name appeared on the August payment gazette as I was not expecting any payments.

Before I provide any personal details, could you please clarify what this payment is for? Also, could you provide more details about your organization and its connection with the United Nations?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tonya
